name: Sarah Chen
summary: Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications and leading technical teams. Passionate about clean code, system design, and mentoring junior developers.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Led a team of 5 engineers to rebuild the customer portal, improving performance by 40%
Architected and implemented microservices migration strategy for legacy monolith
Mentored 3 junior engineers and conducted technical interviews for new hires
Established code review practices and CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed RESTful APIs using Python/Django serving 50k+ daily active users
Implemented data processing pipelines using Apache Airflow and Kafka
Reduced API response times by 60% through database optimization
Collaborated with product managers to define technical requirements

experience.title: Junior Software Developer
responsibilities: Built frontend components using React and Redux
Contributed to backend services in Node.js and Express
Participated in agile ceremonies and sprint planning

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
